modName: Glass fix for Cheskos Wearable Lanterns
summary: Strong glass shine(reflection) fix for Chesko's Wearable Lanterns
descriptionHtml:
Small visual fix for Chesko's Wearable Lanterns.
Requirement:
Chesko's Wearable Lanterns 3.0b - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17416/?

Introduction:
Chesko made one more great mod! But using it I noticed that I don't wanna place the lantern on my follower.. why? because it reflects light from nowhere even in cloudy weather! So finally I made the fix of this aspect and will share it with you ;)

Looking for backpack normal map fix? You can download standalone file here http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52444/?

What it does:
It changes the lanterns NIFs to use the custom normal map texture from mod's directory where the new one has been added.

Options (check screenshots):
1. 50% of shine (reflection)
2. 20% of shine (reflection)

Installation:
1. If you did not - install Wearable Lanterns 3.0b - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17416/?
2. Download one of the fixes you like (check screenshots).
3. Use the NMM or install it manually*

* - it does not overwrite anything, because nifs changed to use custom normal map, not the skyrim's default one, so it will not affect anything except the lantern.


Thanks Chesko for his great mods!
author: Uncheat
